Name: Counterpoint
Effect: If you and your companion attack same target in a turn, second attack has advantage if from opposite range category.

Name: Teamwork
Effect: You or your companion may spend AP when the other spends AP to make an attack. If it hits, double its efficacy.

Name: Balance of Power
Effect: Start of turn, choose companion or host. Chosen half has advantage on all attacks, other has disadvantage.
